thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Hotel Le 18 Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: One night stay
thread.title_full: One night stay - Review of BEST WESTERN Hotel Le 18 Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Gareth K
title: One night stay
text: This hotel is very modern and clean. The bed is really comfortable with lots of pillows and cushions. The room was small but cosy with a shower instead of a bath. I was on the 7th floor and I must say it was really quiet all night so a good night sleep was had. The hotel is very close to the metro however the actual area is not great which is a real shame fine if you are a single guy but a lot of dodgy looking people hanging around. The hotel is great location not so, but then this is reflected in the price if you are planning for a full day in Paris and straight to hotel it's fine but wouldn't hang around the area for drinks etc
